trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There was one other sighting in Modesto on or around October 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out for a smoke when i saw a orange light in the sky dimmer then a star going straight up. A plane was flying by at the same time the object was moving up it came so close to the plane i thought it was going to crash. I offten see helicopters flying around my neighborhood and know that what i saw was not a helicopter, they have a much brighter light then the dim orange ufo i saw. I offten see strange lights appearing and disappearing over highway 99.
Summary: bright orange light traveling straight up. went right past a plane flying by and continued going up then disappeared!
